m_szDocSumamry: PESWiki.com -- Pure Energy Systems Wiki:  Finding and Facilitating the Best Exotic Free Energy Technologies      News:Alternative Fuels From PESWiki Jump to: navigation, search News pertaining to alternative fuels. 2014 Featured: Water > as Fuel > G&G Power Generation Systems Announces Water Fuel Demo - Texas company claims to have the ability to run a genset on ionized water mist, after bringing the engine up to speed using HHO -- no gasoline used. They will be holding a demonstration for potential investors and partners on March 15 in Houston, to bring in funding to engineer for production.
